name: Ruff Interview
description:
Relate canine life experiences to answer tricky job interview questions as three dogs in a trench coat.

Top dog is doing its best to figure out what the interviewer wants to hear. Answer 8 questions correctly to get the job. Get 3 questions wrong and it's game over.

Middle dog will try to snatch cookies off the table during the interview. Click or tap the paw to slap it away. If all three cookies are taken, it's game over.

Bottom dog is trying to keep things in balance. Click or tap on its feet to steady the tower of doggos.
